updated.title: Your app has been updated to the newest version!
updated.content:
Emergency fix for about 5% of devices having connectivity issues when trying to get the daily reflections and literature. Sorry for all of the updates! Spent about 24 hours straight trying to make the third attempt work!

If you are still having issues please report what the error message says when an item does not load. I have implemented a pop up that will tell you the issue after a time out period. Reach out to me by pressing the contact button on the home screen. Without your feedback I am unable to pin down the bug. I know this app is a lifeline for many, so I will figure it out!

If you haven't already, please consider becoming a supporter by clicking the Support Us tab on the home screen. I am currently working on many upgrades and your support allows me to dedicate the time needed!

Just a note, these things take time to integrate, so be patient!

I hope you have a great sober holiday season!

-Ben S.

needsUpdate.title: A new version is available!
needsUpdate.content:
Clicking the button below will take you to the app store where you can manually update the app by clicking 'update'.

This update has an emergency fix (3rd attempt) for users encountering connectivity issues with the daily reflections and literature. I have implemented a pop up which will give you the error message after the request times out. Click the contact button on the home page and let me know what it says, so that I can diagnose the issue. I will continue working on this for as long as it takes to fix! Sorry for all of the updates but I want to ensure the app works for everyone!

If you haven't already, please consider becoming a supporter by clicking the support us tab at the bottom of the home screen. Your support means I am able to dedicate the time needed to maintain and update the app.

 PLEASE NOTE: the 'in app purchase' indicator is referencing the OPTION to contribute. The app is completely FREE to download and update, and is ALWAYS fully featured no matter your contributor status. It should only take a few seconds to update, then you can get back to the literature ðŸ˜Š

message.title: Notification
message.content:
All,
A small amount of users are still having connectivity issues. If you are having issues with the Daily Reflection and or any of the literature loading please contact me through the contact button at the bottom of the homepage. Tell me the type of device you are on, if ALL of the following are working: Daily Reflections, Living Sober, 12 & 12, the pamphlets in the literature tab, the prayers, and the audio section. This can help me diagnose the problem since I can not replicate the issue on my end. Uninstalling and reinstalling the app may fix the issue, as long as you don't have any data (review/gratitude) entries that you need to keep.
-Ben S
